content: first 4 double_crochet decrease 3 times double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet *3 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet decrease 3 times double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet repeat from * across 2 double_crochet in top of turning chain turn repeat row 2 5 thirty more times or until scarf measures about 55 /139 5cm from beginning fasten_off finishing using yarn needle weave in all ends block lightly to finished measurements blocked
